org.magnos.net.nio.udp
Class UdpServerClient

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.net.AbstractClient
      org.magnos.net.nio.udp.UdpServerClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.magnos.io.BufferStreamListener, Adapter, Client
public class UdpServerClient
extends AbstractClient

A simulated client for UDP using NIO.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

                          Server server)
Instantiates a new UdpServerClient.

Parameters:

server - The server which accepted the client, or null if the client was created by the pipeline.

getSocket

public java.lang.Object getSocket()
The Socket of the client. This may be many different things (including null for simulated clients).
